description:
You can find the pawn bases here (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2wzC4Mg

Follow my affiliated link to purchase this awesome game: ICRPG
http://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/212262/INDEX-CARD-RPG-Core-Set?affiliate_id=264999

You can find Drunkens and Dragons (Runehammer) here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCh5vto8JFstb9Sma9zV25g

Become a DM's Craft Patron and help me bring more content to the community by joining Patreon. You will receive weekly exclusive DM Scotty content. https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

title: Crafting ICRPG Paper Standees with DM Scotty
